org.csstudio.ams.connector.sms
Class ConnectorMessageManager

java.lang.Object
  org.csstudio.ams.connector.sms.ConnectorMessageManager

public class ConnectorMessageManager
extends java.lang.Object

This class handles the communication between the connector message manager plugin and the connector.

The message that is used for the communication has the following format: 

 AMS-CON-MANAGER-CMD = {stop | work | send}
 AMS-CON-MANAGER-STATUS = {ok | error}
 AMS-CON-MANAGER-TEXT = {description for the current status}

Author:
Markus Moeller

isValidCommand

private boolean isValidCommand(javax.jms.MapMessage message,
                               java.lang.String command)
Checks whether the message from the plugin is a valid message or not.

Possible commands are: stop, send, work

Parameters:
message - Message object containing the command
command - The command that we expect
Returns:
true, if the message contains a valid command, otherwise false

isMessageForMe

private boolean isMessageForMe(javax.jms.MapMessage message)
Checks whether the message from the plugin is for this connector or not.

Parameters:
message - Message object containing the command
Returns:
true, if the message is for this connector

Parameters:
message - The MapMessage object containing the key/value pairs that are to be copied into a HashMap
